description: Collects SSH-related configuration and key files across user home directories and system-level SSH locations. Gathers authorized_keys, private keys, public keys, and SSH configuration files. Flags potentially weak keys such as ssh-rsa or files containing empty lines. Produces structured NDJSON output including file paths, content, and optional flags for review. Writes results atomically to the Active Response log with .new fallback if locked.

script_parameters.name: ARLog
script_parameters.description: Active Response NDJSON output path (atomic overwrite; falls back to .new if locked).

script_parameters.name: LogPath
script_parameters.description: Path to the rotating human-readable script log.

script_parameters.name: LogMaxKB
script_parameters.description: Maximum size of the log file (KB) before rotation.

script_parameters.name: LogKeep
script_parameters.description: Number of rotated log files to keep.
